00008 #include "rpv130.h"
00009 #include "bt617.h"
00010 
00011 int rpv130_Clear(MVME_INTERFACE *vme, mvme_addr_t base_addr)
00012 {
00013         mvme_set_dmode(vme, RPV130_DATA_SIZE);
00014         mvme_set_am(vme,RPV130_AM);
00015 
00016         mvme_write_value(vme,base_addr + RPV130_CSR_1, 0x3);
00017         mvme_write_value(vme,base_addr + RPV130_CSR_2, 0x3);
00018 
00019         return 0;
00020 }
00021 
00022 int rpv130_IsBusy1(MVME_INTERFACE *vme, mvme_addr_t base_addr)
00023 {
00024         mvme_set_dmode(vme, RPV130_DATA_SIZE);
00025         mvme_set_am(vme,RPV130_AM);
00026 
00027         unsigned short int reg = mvme_read_value(vme,base_addr + RPV130_CSR_1);
00028 
00029         return ((reg & (1<<5))>>5);
00030 }
00031 
00032 int rpv130_IsBusy2(MVME_INTERFACE *vme, mvme_addr_t base_addr)
00033 {
00034         mvme_set_dmode(vme, RPV130_DATA_SIZE);
00035         mvme_set_am(vme,RPV130_AM);
00036 
00037         unsigned short int reg = mvme_read_value(vme,base_addr + RPV130_CSR_2);
00038 
00039         return ((reg & (1<<5))>>5);
00040 }
00041 
00042 int rpv130_IsBusy3(MVME_INTERFACE *vme, mvme_addr_t base_addr)
00043 {
00044         mvme_set_dmode(vme, RPV130_DATA_SIZE);
00045         mvme_set_am(vme,RPV130_AM);
00046 
00047         unsigned short int reg = mvme_read_value(vme,base_addr + RPV130_CSR_2);
00048 
00049         return ((reg & (1<<7))>>7);
00050 }
00051 
00052 void rpv130_PrintBusyStatus(MVME_INTERFACE *vme, mvme_addr_t base_addr)
00053 {
00054         printf("Busy1: %d\n",rpv130_IsBusy1(vme,base_addr));
00055         printf("Busy2: %d\n",rpv130_IsBusy2(vme,base_addr));
00056         printf("Busy3: %d\n",rpv130_IsBusy3(vme,base_addr));
00057 }
00058 
00059 int rpv130_ClearBusy1(MVME_INTERFACE *vme, mvme_addr_t base_addr)
00060 {
00061         mvme_set_dmode(vme, RPV130_DATA_SIZE);
00062         mvme_set_am(vme,RPV130_AM);
00063 
00064         mvme_write_value(vme,base_addr + RPV130_CSR_1, 0x2);
00065 
00066         return 0;
00067 }
00068 
00069 int rpv130_ClearBusy2(MVME_INTERFACE *vme, mvme_addr_t base_addr)
00070 {
00071         mvme_set_dmode(vme, RPV130_DATA_SIZE);
00072         mvme_set_am(vme,RPV130_AM);
00073         mvme_write_value(vme,base_addr + RPV130_CSR_2, 0x2);
00074 
00075         return 0;

00077 
00078 int rpv130_ClearBusy3(MVME_INTERFACE *vme, mvme_addr_t base_addr)
00079 {
00080         mvme_set_dmode(vme, RPV130_DATA_SIZE);
00081         mvme_set_am(vme,RPV130_AM);
00082         mvme_write_value(vme,base_addr + RPV130_CSR_2, 0x3);
00083 
00084         return 0;
00085 }
00086 
00087 int rpv130_Pulse(MVME_INTERFACE *vme, mvme_addr_t base_addr, int chn) 
00088 {
00089         if ((chn < 1) || (chn > 8))
00090                 return -1;
00091 
00092         mvme_set_dmode(vme, RPV130_DATA_SIZE);
00093         mvme_set_am(vme,RPV130_AM);
00094         mvme_write_value(vme,base_addr + RPV130_PULSE, (0x1<<(chn-1)));
00095 
00096         return 0;
00097 }
00098 /*#define TEST_RPV130*/
00099 #ifdef TEST_RPV130
00100 #define V1290N_BASE 0x0040000
00101 #define RPV130_BASE 0x8000
00102 
00103 int main ()
00104 {
00105         printf("Test program for RPV130: \n");
00106         MVME_INTERFACE *myvme;
00107         mvme_open(&myvme, 0);
00108 
00109         rpv130_PrintBusyStatus(myvme,RPV130_BASE);
00110         printf("\n");
00111 
00112         rpv130_ClearBusy3(myvme,RPV130_BASE);
00113         rpv130_PrintBusyStatus(myvme,RPV130_BASE);
00114         printf("\n");
00115 
00116         sleep(1);
00117         rpv130_Pulse(myvme,RPV130_BASE,1);
00118         rpv130_PrintBusyStatus(myvme,RPV130_BASE);
00119 
00120         // Finish
00121         mvme_close(myvme);
00122         return 0;
00123 }
00124 #endif
